Package ihmTable.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatController
    Controller class which manages Chat view
    CollapseButtonController
    Class which manages the collapse button of a collapsible panel
    CollapsiblePanelController
    Class which gives the possibility to collapse and open a panel
    DiceController
    Controller which manages a dice view
    DiceLauncherController
    Controller which manages the dice launcher view and inherit from PlayerDiceController
    GameStatsController
    Controller which manages the game stats view
    MenuController
    Class which manages the menu view
    PlayerController
    Controller which manages the player's view and extends PlayerDiceController
    PlayerDiceController
    Controller which manages dice view
    PlayerStatsController
    Controller which manages the players stats view.
    TableCenterController
    Controller of the table center view
    TableController
    Controller of the table view
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CollapsiblePanelController.Position
    enum which gives the different positions of a collapsible panel
